name: Hairy Situation!!!
description:
Welcome to Itch-e Apparel! Where there are hairy situations everyday! 

Manage a shop where the clothes are all grown onsite by the resident friendly Giant!

Sew the hair you collect from the Giant's beard into the items that your customers want before they run out of patience!

Made by LazyRobot: A collaboration between Griffin Urbano (riffing) and Matthew Cles (dr-mech)
